apple_vendor_description: Apple's rendering of the 'kiss: woman, man, light skin tone, dark skin tone' emoji showcases a tender moment with beautifully blended skin tones and soft, glowing highlights.  The couple is depicted with gentle curves and a subtle blush, emphasizing warmth and affection through Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading.  This emoji beautifully communicates romance, love, and intimate connection between partners of different complexions.
